body.p:
The STS 2000A enclosure is designed for the data center or telecommunications environment. The enclosure is shown in , and enclosure details are listed below.
NEMA-1 rated
Dimensions: 90"W x 60"D x 84"H
Enclosure is primed and painted with suitable semi-gloss enamel both inside and out. The Color is Pearl White with black top venting.
Large cable entry/exit openings top and bottom:
Top entry: 33.75" x 29.00"
Bottom entry: 37.50" x 25.50"
STS weight is approximately 5400 lbs.
